post.body: That is just wrong. Does George Lucas know? LOL
A post on VAT? You are brave. BTW, twitter would be more useful to accountants if more tried it, IMO. Expand right brain maybe.
If you are going to Bellevue, I'd appreciate a road condition tweet!
Sorry. It may have been when I clicked on one of the photo links you posted to the twitter stream, not our blog.
The pop-up ads on your website are truly annoying.
Me too! A recurring problem.
That would be coffee BEANS. But plenty of bread in the store still. And cat food.
It was weird. They had coffee beens but no espresso, or chocolate drinks. Mostly cider (yum) and tea. I did need coffee!!
I'm hoping the wind doesn't take out the power. Otherwise, snug at home is ok. How about you?
As always, great slideshow.
Well, I'm sure you will love it here! Sounds like you already know that. I hope the house moves along quickly. Remodeling - Uggh!
I try to have at least one healthy snack a day! But I've been sitting in my chair much too much today.
Absolutely! Soak up some sun for me while you can! Summers are great here though.
Received the spam DM from your account re: free iPhone. You need to reset your password.
That dog has a good life!
Try zoo sticks: https://glammagems.com/display/4801
LOL. No, your hair looks great! My poodles desperately need a grooming. Keeping them long in the cold weather.
Have you read The Glass Castle? Biographical about woman overcoming childhood of poverty & family dysfunction.
Got the DM spam from your account. Should reset your password.
Jerry McGuire
No thanks on the follow. Yes, I'm a female and I probably would ask dumb computing questions.
Poor guy. He hasn't been tweeting this weekend so I suspect he got hacked! PS... Love your positive attitude!!
Either that or @markdavidson has been toiling 5 miles underground for too long!
Time for shower. I've been taking the work from home in jammies concept a little too far in the personal hygiene realm.
Is it too soon for new year resolutions? I resolve to return to using the family YMCA membership I pay $68 a month for.
A fresh pot of coffee, a kitty on my arm, the kid watching cartoons and my MacBook. Life is good.
This will put a significant crimp on holiday shopping this weekend: http://tinyurl.com/8xlsep
Modern Dog and Bark are great magazines. Today I was reminded that grapes are bad for dogs. Did not remember that.
Has been surprisingly peaceful at home for 3 snow days. Daughter camped in my room with dvds, books, me on computer. She even made lunches.
Almost put windex in my car instead of washer fluid. Well, they R the same color. Glad I double check before adding liquids under the hood.
Ventured out for groceries. Even Starbucks in Safeway was not serving most of their drinks because of no supplies. Another storm coming.
Mailed out 4 recorded Hallmark message cards to the grandfolks today. That's the extent of my Christmas mailings so far. Oh well.
When I said no-brainer tv I wasn't think WrestleMania. Pass.
Taking kitty to bed, after I make up bed and put away laundry. Need to plan next vacation. Trying not to stress about going back to work.
Having hot tea and apple with peanut butter. Because it's easy. Still snowing big flakes like crazy here.
Huge fluffy snowflakes coming down here on Eastside. Dogs came in covered in snow.
Geez! We have almost an inch of snow here!
RT: @ev @crispydragon Try using the "forgot password" link. We reset pw's on affected accounts.
It's snowing here on the Eastside. A much as I dread going back to work, I want more snow even less. Hope it warms up and rains by morning.
I really, really want to take a nap, but then won't sleep tonight & it's up at 5:30AM. I need a good sleep to deal with back to work shock.
